GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an exact article that matches the article_id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an exact article that matches the article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the comments with the specified article_id
